quotes.quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.
quotes.speaker: Seneca

quotes.quote: Time is the most valuable thing that a man can spend.
quotes.speaker: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that's the stuff life is made of.
quotes.speaker: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
quotes.speaker: William Penn

quotes.quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
quotes.speaker: Mother Teresa
